data.eml:eml: Soil mites of the families Ascidae, Blattisociidae and Melicharidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from mountainous areas of Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rueda-Ramírez, Diana, Varela, Amanda, De Moraes, Gilberto J. (2016): Soil mites of the families Ascidae, Blattisociidae and Melicharidae (Acari: Mesostigmata) from mountainous areas of Colombia. Zootaxa 4127 (3): 493-514, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4127.3.5
